name: The Daily Routine of Egyptian Gods
name_original: The Daily Routine of Egyptian Gods
description:
This is a game about the forbidden life of Egyptian Gods. The aim is to explore the environment and pick up objects on the way.

The setting is based on Ancient Egyptian, where the main character(player) is one of the egyptian 'goddess' and her aim is to find all the jars.

Press WASD to move. Space to jump. Shift to run.
